Claritas is a code-style intelligence plugin for IntelliJ that brings order, structure, and refinement to your codebase. It analyzes source files, configuration patterns, and project structure to enforce clear, consistent, and intentional coding practices across your entire team.

Designed to illuminate inconsistencies and elevate readability, Claritas transforms your IDE into a precision tool for writing elegant, reliable, and maintainable code.
